name: Mr Bullet Time
description:
Mr Bullet Time defeat all the enemies. Use whatever means possible including stopping time.

TIME & BULLETS ONLY.

Features:
► Each Level a Unique Puzzle
► One Finger Controls
► Quick and challenging levels
► Rich 3D Graphics
► Slow motion
► Satisfying gameplay
► Optimized Battery Consumption
► Tons of weapons

WARNING! Extremely addictive.
